Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, hey, <sp:5:0:0>traveler.


Just bit ago, over at Foothill Stable where
I work, there was this group of guys
hanging out in their undershorts! No joke!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Good news is, they're all gone now.


I'm sure someone gave them a good
talking to and chased them off.<sp:5:0:0> I really
gotta thank whoever that someone is!
Anyway, thank goodness I can look after
the <clr:0000>doggies <clr:ffff>without getting an eyeful.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Well, well, good work finding 'em!
OK! Here now, here now!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> You're not walking around in
nothing but undershorts...<sp:5:1:0>

Ah, you must be a traveler. So,<sp:5:0:0> you're
not going to believe this...

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>There's a group of guys in their skivvies
hanging out at Foothill Stable, which is
where I work.
Just guys in their undershorts,
everywhere ya look! It's the worst.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>That's why I was here looking after the
<clr:0000>doggies<clr:ffff>. Doing some self-care, ya know?

Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>That's right!<sp:5:0:0> The same ones raised at this
very stable! <sp:5:1:0>Aren't they the cutest?

They also have this amazing ability. <sp:5:1:0>Their
incredible sense of smell can <clr:0000>lead you
to treasure<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>But they won't do that for just anybody.
You have to show them lots of love first.
You know, <clr:0000>befriend <clr:ffff>them and <clr:0000>feed<clr:ffff> them.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>But they'll repay that love by showing
you the most amazing things!
Talk_13:

Your fashion choices need some work.
Get out of here!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>That's right!<sp:5:0:0> These little guys!<sp:5:1:0> Aren't they

But they're not just cute. Oh no, no, no.

Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, shoot, it's already dark! I lose all
track of time when I'm with the doggies.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>If you need a place to stay until morning,
traveler, you can rest at the stable!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Well, if you want to relax, you should
definitely try playing with the dogs.

Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey there, traveler. <sp:5:0:0>Welcome to
Foothill Stable.

You, uh, got a second? I gotta tell
ya something.

<sp:3:0:2:0200>So, there were these guys in their
underwear just hanging out at Foothill
Stable, which is where I work.
No joke. It was undershorts everywhere
ya looked. It was the worst.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But they're all gone now.


I'm sure someone gave them a piece of
their mind and chased them off.<sp:5:0:0> I need
to thank whoever that someone is.
Anyway, now I can look after the <clr:0000>doggies<clr:ffff>
without getting an eyeful, which is nice.
